post.description:
The Tacho Live Endpoint aims to provide the latest known tacho status and aggregated timers in a list of requested drivers.
The intention is to feed a third-party application, like a Transport Management System (TMS) or any productivity management tool with up-to-date Drivers’ times.
Note: this endpoint should not be used to historicize the data. Instead, please use the Tacho Activity endpoint to request the drivers’ past tacho activities.

401.description: 401 response, not authorized or no valid token

403.description: 403 response, Forbiden don't have access to the feature

post.description: The Tacho Activity Endpoint aims to provide the drivers’ historical activities. The intention is to feed a third-party application, like a Workforce, or Payroll Prep management tool with historical Drivers’ activities

401.description: 401 response, not authorized or no valid token

403.description: 403 response, Forbiden don't have access to the feature

driverKeys.description: MUST be identical to the full key unique 14 character chars and issue number. At least one parameter from this list must be provided: driverKeys, registrations, lastUpdatedSince

registrations.description: MUST be identical to the vehicle registration registered with Connect.

skip.description: Number of records to be skipped before the beginning of the result set. This acts as an offset from the first record matching the request parameters.

limit.description: Limit the number of records to return in the response.

sort.description: The object contains direction and field path to sort. Sets the sort order to be either ascending (ASC) or descending (DESC).

data.description: List of driver's current tacho status and cumulated time

eventDateTime.description: Date and time in UTC when the last tacho event was received

lastUpdateTime.description: Date and time in UTC when the last tacho driver status was updated

timersQualityLevel.description: Indicates the level of quality of the Live timers

heading.description: Compass heading of the vehicle in degrees clockwise from north.

infringementState.description:
0 — no time-related warning detected
1 — continuous driving time pre-warning active (15 min before 4h30)
2 — continuous driving time warning active (4h30 exceeded)
3 — daily driving time pre-warning active (daily driving time above 9 hours or above the maximum allowed daily driving time)
4 — daily driving time warning active (daily driving time above 9 hours or above the maximum allowed daily driving time)
5 — daily/weekly rest pre-warning active
6 — daily/weekly rest warning active
7 — weekly driving time pre-warning active
8 — weekly driving time warning active
9 — 2 weeks driving time pre-warning active
10 — 2 weeks driving time warning active
11 — driver 1 card expiry warning active
12 — next mandatory driver 1 card download warning active
13 — Working time warning active (6h)
14 — Daily working time warning active (10h)
15 — Weekly working time warning active  (60h)
16 — Driving without a card inserted
17 — Driver Card inserted during weekly rest

continuousDrivingTime.description: Continuous Driving in the current 4.5 h shift. Any value > 4.5h means an infringement. (mins)

dailyDrivingTime.description: Cumulated Driving time since the beginning of the working day (mins)

weeklyDrivingTime.description: Cumulated driving time since the beginning of the week. (mins)

previousAndCurrentTotalDriveTime.description: Total drive time of current and previous week (mins)

remainingDrivingTime.description: This time is the maximum remaining driving time left to the next required break/rest (mins)

remainingDailyDrivingTime.description: Maximum remaining driving time left on the current day for a driver (mins)

remainingWeeklyDrivingTime.description: Maximum remaining driving time left on the current week for a driver (mins)

timeLeftUntilNextDailyRest.description: Time left until the driver can start a new daily rest period (mins)

nextDailyRestMinDuration.description: Minimum daily rest the driver needs to do to fulfill an ongoing or approaching daily rest period (mins)

timeLeftUntilNextWeeklyRest.description: Time left until the driver can start a new weekly rest period (mins)

nextWeeklyRestMinDuration.description: Minimum weekly rest the driver needs to do to fulfill an ongoing or approaching weekly rest period (mins)

lastDailyRestEnd.description: This date is the end of the last daily rest period of driver 1, as computed by the tachograph using driver 1 card data

lastWeeklyRestEnd.description: This date is the end of the last weekly rest period of driver 1, as computed by the tachograph using driver 1 card data

remainingDailyExtendedDriveTimePeriods.description: Number of remaining times the driver can have an extended 10 hours daily drive time (can be 2, 1, 0)

remainingDailyShortenedRestTimePeriods.description: Number of remaining times driver can have a short 9 hours daily rest (can be 3, 2, 1, 0)

workingTimeSinceLastBreak.description: Working time since last break/rest was taken (mins)

remainingWorkingTime.description: Remaining working time left to next required break/rest according to (mins)

dailyWorkingTime.description: Cumulated working time since the beginning of the working day (mins)

remainingDailyWorkingTime.description: Remaining working time left to next daily rest(mins)

weeklyWorkingTime.description: Cumulated working time since the beginning of the working week (mins)

remainingWeeklyWorkingTime.description: Remaining working time left for next weekly rest (mins)

dailyBreakTime.description: Cumulated breaking time of the day (mins)

drivingPrediction.description: List of next possible driving-related activities

duration.description: Duration of the activity in minutes

workingPrediction.description: List of next possible working-related activities

duration.description: Duration of the activity in minutes

driverCardExpiryDate.description: Date of expiry for the driver's card

driverCardNextMandatoryDownloadDate.description: This date is the mandatory date for card download

timeLeftUntilNextRestPeriod.description: This time is the time left until the next break/rest period (mins)

nextRestDuration.description: duration of the next break/rest for the driver

driverKeys.description: MUST be identical to the full key unique 14 character chars and issue number

registrations.description: MUST be identical to the vehicle registration registered with Connect.

startTime.description: The start date and time for the period, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endTime.description: The end date and time for the period, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

skip.description: Number of records to be skipped before the beginning of the result set. This acts as an offset from the first record matching the request parameters.

limit.description: Limit the number of records to return in the response

sort.description: Object contain direction and field path to sort. Sets the sort order to be either ascending (ASC) or descending (DESC)

inProgress.description: Indicates whether the activity block is currently open (true) or closed by a further activity (false)

startTime.description: Start date and time in UTC of the tacho activity

activity.description:
When "type" is TACHO.
Possible values of "activity" are :
RESTING
AVAILABLE
WORKING
DRIVING
DRIVER_CARD_EJECTED

startLatitude.description: Asset latitude position when the activity starts

startLongitude.description: Asset longitude position when the activity starts

endTime.description: End date and time in UTC of the tacho activity

endLatitude.description: Asset latitude position when the activity ends

endLongitude.description: Asset longitude position when the activity ends

flagDDD.description: Indicates what is the data source of the activity. True: the activity is from DDD. False: the activity has been generated in real-time by the platform

flagManualEntry.description: Indicates whether the activity was manually entered (true) or automatically generated (false)

colors.description:
key : activity type
Possible values :
RESTING
AVAILABLE
WORKING
DRIVING
DRIVER_CARD_EJECTED
INFRINGEMENT
NIGHT_HOURS

value : colour code
Possible values :
SILVER
STEEL
AZURE
BLUE
GREY
RED
GREEN
PURPLE
YELLOW

disabledInfringements.description:
This is always empty by default

Possible values :
EXCEEDED_CONTINUOUS_DRIVING
EXCEEDED_DAILY_DRIVING
INSUFFICIENT_REST
EXCEEDED_WEEKLY_DRIVING
EXCEEDED_BIWEEKLY_DRIVING
EXCEEDED_CONTINUOUS_WORKING
EXCEEDED_DAILY_WORKING
EXCEEDED_WEEKLY_WORKING

tacAuthorizer.name: Authorization
tacAuthorizer.x-amazon-apigateway-authtype: Custom authorization scheme using Masternaut for Tacho
